resources.string: Enter the word you want and then its translation. We will remember it for you when you want!
Evaluate yourself! Try reviewing the questions you have saved so you don\'t forget them.
Save your phrases, definitions, words, etc. and we will remind you of them when you want.
Show a toast with the inserted questions and answers. Set your time interval.
Show a pop-up window, guess your question or press the exit button to close the window. Set your time interval.
Show a pop-up card that will remind you of your memories. Set your time interval.
Show a bubble that allows a window to emerge to save words while using other applications.
Show a bubble that allows a card to emerge to save your memories while using other applications.

You can define the time in which you want to be reminded of the questions and answers you have entered through a toast that will appear at the bottom of your screen while using other applications, you must add questions to enable this function.

You can define the time in which you want to practice your questions even when you are using other applications through a pop-up window that will show you your question and close if you answer correctly or by pressing the close button. Add your questions to enable this functionality.
You can define the time in which you want a card to appear on your screen showing one of the memories you have saved while using other applications, you must add memories to enable this function.

A permanent bubble will appear on your screen that when pressed will open a window that will allow you to save your questions while using other applications and you can close the window by pressing the bubble again. You can close the bubble by quickly swiping down.

A permanent bubble will appear on your screen that when pressed will open a card that will allow you to save your memories while using other applications and you can close the card by pressing the bubble again. You can close the bubble by quickly swiping down.
Enable Allow display over other apps from the settings
The questions section allows you to enter a question and an answer made by you, these will be displayed on your screen at a time interval set by you in the settings section.
The evaluation section allows you to practice your questions, that is, you must enter the answer to the question you saved yourself and if it is correct you can move on to your next question
The memory section allows you to save words, phrases, etc. that do not have an answer. You can set the time interval you want to be reminded of in the settings section.
The list section allows you to view, edit, and delete the questions and memories you have saved. They are divided into two sections, which you can see by pressing the switch at the top.
You must fill in the fields
You must fill in the text fields
Time equal to 0 is not valid
Do you want to delete the word?
